name: Garlic Cheddar Cauliflower
description: This Garlic Cheddar Cauliflower recipe is a delightful addition to your healthy recipe collection. It's low-sodium and high in fiber, falling perfectly under the tag of Healthified Recipes. A dish that ensures you enjoy delicious flavors without compromising on your health goals.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the cauliflower and cut it into florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the red and green capsicum into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix the cauliflower florets, chopped capsicum, grated cheese, salt, ground pepper, and spice. Ensure everything is evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the mixture onto a baking sheet in a single layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and the cheese is bubbly and slightly golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
